data.text: @santouris Pandemic is over? When did that happen??
@santouris The pandemic isn't over.  Anyone who says otherwise is selling something.
@Forrest05 Well currently waiting for a call from a doctor to see if I need treatment as I’m a little more vulnerable than others. Fingers crossed it won’t come to that.

@santouris It’s very frustrating. Hope you don’t get any more symptoms or feel any worse. I’m a postie and I don’t think I could manage a mile walking at the minute let alone the 12 I normally do a day. The removal of restrictions was an absolute joke.
@Forrest05 I’ll see how it plays out for me, frustrated I can’t do anything due to government advice but I can go to work and serve people food. 🤡🤡
@santouris Me too it’s been a week and I’ve had to get sick note because I still am too unwell to go back work… I had my 4th jab three weeks ago tomorrow
@santouris Aww, jeez dude. Sorry this has happened to you. I hope you recover quickly and with no long term effects!
@santouris Sorry, hope you're not feeling too bad and can get over it quickly
